name: White Radish And Jicama Salad
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, jicama, radish, side dish, spring
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups peeled white radish (daikon) in julienne strips
1 1/2 cups peeled jicama, in julienne strips
1 bunch fresh coriander, well rinsed and drained

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the white radish and jicama. Toss with the vinegar and sesame oil. Mix in the scallions.
Just before serving, remove the stems from the coriander and coarsely chop the leaves. Fold into the salad and serve.
